com.netmera.mobile
Class NetmeraBroadcastReceiver

java.lang.Object
  android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      com.netmera.mobile.NetmeraBroadcastReceiver

public class NetmeraBroadcastReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver

This is used to receive Push messages and deliver them to NetmeraIntentService. This BroadcastReceiver should be defined between the <application></application> tags in the AndroidManifest.xml file. 

 <receiver android:name="com.netmera.mobile.NetmeraBroadcastReceiver" android:permission="com.google.android.c2dm.permission.SEND">

     <intent-filter>

         <!-- Receives the actual messages. -->

         <action android:name="com.google.android.c2dm.intent.RECEIVE" />

         <!-- Receives the registration id. -->

         <action android:name="com.google.android.c2dm.intent.REGISTRATION" />

         <category android:name="com.google.android.gcm.demo.app" />

     </intent-filter>

 </receiver>
